name: Solar-System Coursera Course Project 1
description:
These are the modifications that  i  made:

1.  I added a halo around the sun

2. I added the planets: mercury, jupiter, and planet.

3. i  added multiple moons around the planet jupiter and got rid of the moon around mercury

4. i changed the speed of rotation and revolution for all planets.

5. i changed the position of the comet spawner

6. i changed the position of the mini-camera and the main camera

Credits: Made my Manoj Kumar
